Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.bench

Class Benchmark

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.bench.Benchmark
public class Benchmark extends Object
Defines a planning problem and reasonable limits on the search to solve it. Because a problem defines an author utility, it may be possible to defines more than one benchmark task for a single problem by setting different goal utilities and limits on the search.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

  • Constructor Details

    • Benchmark

      public Benchmark(String name, String file, double goal, int atl, int ctl, int el)
      Constructs a new benchmark task.
      Parameters:
      name - a unique name for the task that will be used in the report
      file - the name of the file that defines the task in the problems directory
      goal - the goal utility that must be achieved
      atl - the author temporal limit to use when searching
      ctl - the character temporal limit to use when searching
      el - the epistemic limit to use when searching

  • Method Details

    • load

      public void load(edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util.Worker.Status status) throws IOException, edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.io.ParseException
      Parses the problem file, compiled it, and parses an example solution if one exists.
      Parameters:
      status - a status to update while parsing and compiling
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs when reading the problem or solution file
      edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.io.ParseException - if the problem or solution file cannot be parsed

    • getProblem

      public edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.Problem getProblem()
      Returns the problem (before compilation) to be solved in this benchmark task. This method returns null unless load(Status) has been called.
      Returns:
      the problem before compilation

    • getCompiledProblem

      public edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.comp.CompiledProblem getCompiledProblem()
      Returns the compiled problem to be solved in this benchmark task. This method returns null unless load(Status) has been called.
      Returns:
      the compiled problem

    • getSolution

      public edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.Solution<edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.comp.CompiledAction> getSolution()
      Returns a known example solution to the task if one is defined. This method returns null unless load(Status) has been called and an example solution is provided.
      Returns:
      an example solution, or null if one is not provided
